name: RoBox - Save The Robots
description:
Celebrating the imminent release of RoBox 2, the original RoBox is now available on iOS 100% FREE!!!
Stay tuned for the release of RoBox 2!!!

Save the Robots from the zombie virus and restore their original software.
A puzzle game where you need to put all the boxes over the green switch to pass to the next level.
Finish all the levels to find the USB that contains the Original software to save all the robots.
Help and save the robots but be careful they are every where !!
